The code:

module graph
    implicit none
    type :: Edge
        integer :: to
        integer :: length
    end type Edge

    type :: EdgeArray
        type(Edge), allocatable :: edges(:)
    end type EdgeArray

    type(EdgeArray), allocatable :: adjacency_list(:)
    integer, allocatable :: colors(:)
end module graph

program main
    use graph
    implicit none
    integer :: n, m, i, u, v, w
    type(Edge), allocatable :: temp_edges(:)

    read(*,*) n
    m = n - 1

    allocate(adjacency_list(0:n-1))
    allocate(colors(0:n-1))
    colors = -1

    do i = 1, m
        read(*,*) u, v, w
        u = u - 1  ! convert to 0-based
        v = v - 1

        ! Add u -> v edge
        if (allocated(adjacency_list(u)%edges)) then
            adjacency_list(u)%edges = [adjacency_list(u)%edges, Edge(v, w)]
        else
            adjacency_list(u)%edges = [Edge(v, w)]
        end if

        ! Add v -> u edge
        if (allocated(adjacency_list(v)%edges)) then
            adjacency_list(v)%edges = [adjacency_list(v)%edges, Edge(u, w)]
        else
            adjacency_list(v)%edges = [Edge(u, w)]
        end if
    end do

    call dfs(0, 0)

    do i = 0, n-1
        print *, colors(i)
    end do

contains

    recursive subroutine dfs(node, cumulative_length)
        integer, intent(in) :: node, cumulative_length
        integer :: i
        type(Edge) :: e

        if (colors(node) /= -1) return

        colors(node) = mod(cumulative_length, 2)

        if (.not. allocated(adjacency_list(node)%edges)) return

        do i = 1, size(adjacency_list(node)%edges)
            e = adjacency_list(node)%edges(i)
            call dfs(e%to, cumulative_length + e%length)
        end do
    end subroutine dfs

end program main
